name: openapi-fetcher
title: openapi-fetcher
description: Add an OpenAPI spec, auth token, then make requests.
author: zebapy

commands.name: add-openapi-spec
commands.title: Add OpenAPI Spec
commands.description: Add a new OpenAPI specification URL to your collection

commands.name: list-specs
commands.title: Browse API Specs
commands.description: View saved OpenAPI specs and browse their endpoints

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
